name: HI5PACE
description:
It's the year 20XX, and alien creatures have come from the Boomerang Nebula, and only one pilot can stop them.

Made for the Game Boy Jam 2016, using pygame. Press different combinations of UP/LEFT/DOWN/RIGHT/SPACE quickly at the start for different palettes!

You can find the source code for the game on github here, for perusing/building from source/modifying, etc.

Happy gaming, and I wish you a new high score!
